painPoints.title: Legacy BSS Systems Limiting Agility
painPoints.description: AT&T operating with legacy BSS systems that slow enterprise product launches. CloudSense integration with legacy systems needs optimization.

painPoints.title: 5G Enterprise Bundles Complexity
painPoints.description: New 5G enterprise solutions (private networks, edge compute) require complex bundling and pricing not fully supported by current CPQ configuration.

painPoints.title: FirstNet Quote Turnaround Requirements
painPoints.description: FirstNet public safety contracts require rapid quote turnaround. Need to optimize CPQ for government procurement cycles.

opportunities.title: 5G Enterprise Solutions CPQ
opportunities.description: Expand CloudSense to handle private 5G network, edge compute, and IoT enterprise bundles

opportunities.title: FirstNet Accelerated Quote Module
opportunities.description: Purpose-built CPQ module for FirstNet public safety contracts with government procurement workflows

opportunities.title: Legacy BSS Integration Enhancement
opportunities.description: Optimize CloudSense integration with AT&T's legacy billing and provisioning systems
